phrases: I am Kinoshita Kazuya, twenty years old,
and I am a college student living by myself in Tokyo.
Fun fact: I have a girlfriend.
I have fallen in love with someone else!
She was the first girlfriend I ever had...
And she dumped me after just one month?
Tried to casually hold her hand
I tried so many things to bring us closer.
I should go catch the last train.
Nothing beats taking a train to get back home, huh?
hYou are blocked from following @pyon-pyon210 and viewing @pyon-pyon210's Tweets.
She is already moved on and gone all the way with the new guy?!
And why am I getting turned on?
He is ready to move out!
A gem of an app that heals your soul...
Spend a dreamlike time with our talents!
You are free to choose your girlfriend!
Perfect if you are worried or stressed out about your love life!
Like... I am just... fed up with it all.
A pure and refined high-class girlfriend
I bet the girl's going to be fugly without all the filters.
An orange shirt and striped pants...
Oh, but I took a gap year.
Ah, you are older than me, then.
Anyone dating her would be living the life!
I want to go home and sleep.
Oh, so we are following the date plan I sent by text.
This is my first time at an aquarium.
Oh, that is the glowlight tetra.
Do you know a lot about fish?
I am so glad my first aquarium visit was with you!
Well, I had lots of fun today.
The Head-over-Heels for Mizuhara Chizuru Thread
she held my hand at the end too,
She was only businesslike at first
The see you -> bright smile totally makes you want to repeat
I am glad I was not the only one to fall for her, but there is way too many of you guys!!!
Holding hands before the end is just part of her routine?!
How dare she toy with my heart?!
She was a moron who did not even know the names of common fish
She was a moron who did not even know the names of common fish.
I will not send you any more money for living expenses.
Make sure you do not get swept up in campus life and waste it all.
I am not going to college to have fun!
I just need to give her a piece of my mind!
Sorry, it took me a while to set my hair.
I was worried you might not like this hairdo.
I-I do not hate it or anything.
Hey, does not it make you feel empty inside?
Y'know, going on dates with guys you do not even like,
Does not it get to you?
I get to meet people like you, after all.
Will one bag do for the mister and missus?
No, we are not even that.
I guess I will split your purchases up.
We can be whatever you want us to be, Kazuya-kun.
Garden eels hide in the sand because they are afraid, right?
She must have read up on them.
She did her homework... all for today's date.
Seriously, what is that going to achieve?
Not like these relationships last more than a day!
Hey, what is gotten into you, Kazuya-kun?
It does not matter how much you care for your partner!
Let us get out of here.
But I got it off my chest!
Why do all these girls get into fake relationships
with people they do not even like?!
Yelling like that in a public place...
Way to get everyone is eyes on us!
All day you have been like, Do not you feel empty inside?
This is just how it works!
Were not you the one who made the request?!
You saw the user agreement and clicked I agree, did not you?!
Also, why did you give me a one-star review?!
Did I do anything wrong on our date?!
That brought my rating down a whole 0.3 points, you know!
I would only ever gotten five-star reviews before that.
And I am proud of that fact!
This is the real Mizuhara Chizuru.
I have always given this job my all, including this date.
I do not even like fish, but I went and bought a book about them for this date,
She is a completely different person than before.
and this is how you treat me?!
All I can say for sure is...
Could you not get in the way of my work?
Guess I am getting another one-star review!
I am totally in the wrong.
I will tag along if you want to keep going.
We are not done talking here!
It is not such a big deal.
But of course we would worry, Mother!
Mom, you need to realize that you are not young anymore.
We do have a shop to run...
And this is not the first time you have been hospitalized.
The phone is probably a bad idea...
I will get you some magazines for senior citizens!
Would you like something soft to eat?
Do not act like I am on my last legs!
who might that young lady be?
I brought her in because she was with Kazuya.
Are you his classmate from college?
You could not be his girlfriend, right?
We are talking about Kazuya here.
This is Kazuya we are talking about.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
It is a shame I had to introduce myself under such circumstances,
but I am glad to meet you all nonetheless.
We need to get home and prepare for a party!
You should get other tests done while you are here!
Kazuya's brought home a real hale and hearty hottie!
He has such a beautiful girlfriend!
Do you have any idea what this means?!
After showing no signs of anything resembling a love life for twenty whole years...
We are heading back to the store.
And make sure you walk your girlfriend back, okay?
Chizuru-san, come visit our home sometime.
Physical compatibility matters a lot in a marriage.
Kazuya-san and I have talked about it.
We both want to take these things seriously.
He is your family's eldest son, so we wanted to hold off until we had your approval.
Her ad-libbing skill is on point!
Let me go get the other old girls!
They asked me to introduce my grandson's girlfriend if he ever got one!
Hey, what is going on here?
You did not mention any of this!
Oh, this is the third time she is been hospitalized here.
It seems she is made quite a few friends here.
My grandma's an in-patient at this hospital, too.
I have not told her anything about the rental girlfriend job.
Is not that really bad news?
That is exactly what I said!
Anyway, I need to get out of here!
She is a real babe, I tell you!
I have never seen a girl that hot!
Try not to collapse in shock, Tanaka-san.
The rest of you watch out for heart attacks, too!
They were here just a minute ago!
We are not doubting you, Kinoshita-san.
It is only a matter of time before they find us here.
They cannot have gone too far.
Want To exit through the window?
We are on the fifth floor, you know.
We will have to leave one at a time.
You go first and distract them.
I will use that chance to get outside.
I thought that room was unoccupied.
Let us check it just in case.
Hey, what is the big idea?!
What in the world is wrong with you?!
It is a natural response for any twenty-year-old guy!
Get it back down right now!
If you keep it up, I will report you to the agency.
If I may ask, have you seen a young couple around?
I-I heard them talking about leaving the hospital.
She is my girlfriend, is not she?
Do not forget that I am just a rental girlfriend!
Hell could freeze over, and I still would not be yours for real!
You mean your grandson's girlfriend is Chizuru?
I should not make this worse for her!
I do not really have a girl
Kazuya-san's grandmother and mine are friends?
Like it was written in the stars!
To think Chizuru was your granddaughter, Ichinose-san!
I do not believe it, either.
But it all makes sense now.
Of course your granddaughter would be a bombshell in every possible way!
I can also rest easy if Chizuru is dating your grandson, Kinoshita-san.
Here is hoping we go from friends to family when they get married.
Sorry... I made you lie for me.
Lots of clients want to introduce me to their family.
Anyway, it is partly my fault for keeping this job a secret.
Let us just tell them we broke up.
My family runs a store called Nagomi Sake.
It was started in my granddad's time,
and now my dad and mom run it.
Even after my granddad died early,
my gran kept it running, despite having debts and my dad to worry about.
So, to our family, my gran's like a goddess.
And it is our goddess's wish that I find someone nice before she dies.
I am a real grandma's boy, so I want to grant her wish before she goes.
I had a girlfriend for a month, recently.
When I asked her to meet my gran, she refused.
It was out of desperation that I pressed that button
One that dies if it gets lonely.
There is no one alive who does not get lonely.
Just a lot of people good at hiding it.
They all fill the void in their heart with work or significant others.
I will apologize to my gran...
and introduce a real girlfriend to her someday.
I will figure it out myself.
After all, there is no way to get your true self on rental.
Could you please not drag me into your embarrassingly self-absorbed soliloquy?
Y-You are one to talk, with the corny act you put on every day!
Hey, I do it for work.
Corny is perfectly fine by me.
I want to make my family happy, too.
I just cannot quit this job right now.
I do not want anything like today's date ever again,
but whenever you find yourself feeling like a rabbit,
I doubt I will see Mizuhara Chizuru ever again.
I will not turn to her anymore.
I am done with pretend dating forever.
The cutest, hottest, most fashionable, and greatest girlfriend ever!hh
And this is where my real story begins.
How many times did you jerk it yesterday?
The story of my rueful virgin life starts now!
The anime's finally airing, huh, Mizuhara?
I am so glad I get do the preview in episode one with you!
Are you in rental girlfriend mode right now?
Mind if we get the formalities out of the way?
You will have to pay the base fee, the choice fee,
and an extra fee for a 30-second preview, totaling
You have sure got it rough, Kazu-kun.
